response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, considering its market value of $15,000 to you. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially securing this valuable asset for you.", "product_price": 14000}
